duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintains, operates, monitors, and repairs all utilities and related central plant equipment in hospital, clinic, and supporting facilities.
Changes air filters, replaces light bulbs, and repairs minor plumbing issues.
Monitors and operates power plant equipment and troubleshoots engineering equipment and systems.
Completes preventive maintenance, work requests, and building rounds promptly.
Acts in compliance with proper work order form, manufacturer's recommended maintenance, and operating parameters.
Maintains the central plant in good, clean working condition and documents all activities and maintenance.
Performs general maintenance of facilities and some repairs.
Performs other related duties as required.
